mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.update_time as updateTime, t.create_time as createTime, t.creater_id as createrId, t.updater_id as updaterId, t.company_id as companyId, t.prefix as prefix, t.places as places, t.arrange_type as arrangeType, t.new_value as newValue, t.type as type
mapper.select: select , s.store_id as storeId, s.name as storeName from qft_store s left join qft_code_set t on s.id = t.store_id where s.is_delete = 0 and company_id = #{companyId}
